meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a plant in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The green, leafy creature had a plantlike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with plantlike decorations and ornaments.
meanings.sent3: The plantlike robot watered the flowers with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were so graceful, almost plantlike in their fluidity.
meanings.sent5: The forest was alive with plantlike creatures swaying in the breeze.
